content: Simply not bloody working! Main menu is not reacting to anything, can't start the game! =\ refunding. Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ 5G, Android 11. I'll gladly purchase it again and update my review when this game (and all others) get fixed. Tho, +2 stars for the fast reply ;-)
replyContent: Hi there, thanks for your comment and so sorry for this issue. Unfortunately it seems that the app is not yet compatible with the new Android 11. We are working on this and will update the app as soon as possible. If you still prefer a refund, feel free to contact us or use Google Play refund procedure. Thanks.

content: Unfortunately none of these games except for Tales work on the Pixel 3 XL running Android 11. Very disappointing, I'll gladly update my reviews if they can be fixed.
replyContent: Hi there, thanks for reporting, we are very sorry for this issue. We are working on it and will update the app as soon as possible. Thank you very much again.

content: I really enjoyed the game but it got increasingly convoluted towards the end to the point where I realized that life was too short.

Exceptional! Definitely worth the price! I played this game for a long time, as there are many chapters; and am going to play again to see how much I recall. Clue button didn't always work, but other than that, controls worked just fine. Graphics were top notch, just enough creepiness. üòâ Puzzles were challenging most of the time!

I have played all the silent hill games. I love all of them. I very much enjoy the art and disturbing stories and the way it is all set up. Someone left a review saying the hint button didn't work all the time. Here's why: it only pops up with a hint option if you are looking at a puzzle that needs solved. Wont work if you're just needing to know what to do next. It only shows clues for puzzles. I have found very little other games that i find this enjoyable. If you like twisted horror stories.
So worth every cent
Enjoyed playing all the forgotten hill series. Waiting for next one üòÅ

The game was really intense and i enjoyed playing it a second time. Im having trouble with the clue button. Sometimes nothing happens and i have to try four or five times to get a response. I paid again, but my fault. I changed my email address.
Bravissimi per questo capolavoro !
Update, the problem was solved

I absolutely love all of these games, but the amount of crashing on this particular one was RIDICULOUS. This is the only one that costs money, but the only one that gave me hell. At times I would click one thing and then nothing else would work, so I'd have to completely close the game and open it again. Over and over and over and over and over.....I recommend the rest, but until this one gets fixed it should also be free.
replyContent: Hi there, so sorry you are having troubles in playing Forgotten Hill Disillusion. Have you tried changing Quality? Just visit the Options Menu by tapping the "gear" button and change Quality from HIGH to LOW. This will make graphics a bit lighter without changing the game experience. Let us know if it solves your issues.

content: Game imagery genuinely makes me uncomfortable but I don't want to take points off for that, because that may be a positive aspect for others. The puzzles are good and are possible to solve but still marginally difficult. A good price for a decent amount of gameplay.

I enjoyed this quite a bit. There were a few puzzles where I can't figure out how one was supposed to find the answer, though (even after watching the official videos on them). Otherwise, I liked the length and feel it was well worth the cost!
This is a fantastic game, well worth the very reasonable price for the quality and the amount of content in this game!! I would have paid double. Highly recommended!
Great game, graphics, music and mood. I did have to use quite a lot of walkthrough help but it didn't take anything away from the game.
Amazing game. Graphics, atmosphere, story, puzzles all superb. And, long! This wonderfully long. Worth every penny!

Ill admit the game is a bit daunting and you can get lost in what to do next, but definitely worth it as its a full length game for the price. There werent as many clues as what to do next or how to solve a puzzle but the games are really fun as usual with a lot of both. Has the creepy disturbing atmosphere its known for and glad to see the previous protagonist back. New mechanics that give off a Silent Hill vibe while still being original. Always a pleasure and cant wait for the next!
Best one yet! So beautifully weird and creepy. Not too simple. I love that in a game.
Absolutely love this series. Puzzles are hard. And sometimes can't follow whats going on. Not alot of clues. I just use the walkthru... ALOT üëç

Holy moly!!! This game is an absolute great buy! i've played all of the FMSTUDIO games, and this one is like 5 times the length of any of those. super tricky and fun all at the same time...i must admit, i needed some help, but then after i youtubed it i felt so dumb. ;b
boris 2020 forgotten hoill horror puzzle
Nice long game play, great puzzles, loved the hint system it was just enough! The forgotten hill games get better and better, keep up the great work!

I already got this on my s7...... do I need to pay the price twice? Just wanted to play while I am winding down in bed! This is the best game since MYST! Details are phenomenal, puzzles are maniacal...... and just creepy. Great job.
Great game, one of best in genre.
replyContent: Hi Roger, thanks for playing. For the worm grinder puzzle, be careful to not release the handle during the combination. It has to be one single movement.

content: Need new game love these when are new ones coming
One of the best games of this type on the play store.

Awesome game, especially for the price. Very cleverly done, lots of locations to explore, and intuitive puzzles. I had to use a walkthrough to help occasionally, especially with the last chapter. Great job, FM Studios!

I want a refund I get almost through the game and I open a cabinet in the hall with the angel statue and had to turn my game off when I open it again to play key is gone and door is locked I want a refund not worth the five dollars this game was awful

I must say this sequel was intriguing. Graphics, music, controls and gameplay were excellent. Well worth it's weight and gold. Thank you so much to the developers and I recommend it, to anyone who are into these genres.
Good game. Great length. Worth the price

Great story and game play It has great puzzles, graphics, and story. I gave 4/5 since some of the puzzles were too difficult or convoluted, especially the very ending part - I ended up just watching the walkthrough on YouTube rather than bothering with it. Overall, well worth the hours I put in! Thank you!!!
I love these games!!!
Wow such great game, 200% worth the price!!! This is a whole new level for the forgotten hills series, the riddle/graphic/plot/complexity! WOW
I really enjoyed this game! It's quite a long game and well worth paying for.
Wow, another great game from these guys , very hard in some bits but kept me playing for hours!!

Awesome game and well worth the price. A dark, somewhat gruesome point and click that took me a couple days to get through. By the way...the survey for this rating has some wierd questions. "Is this game realistic?" God I hope not.
I love these games please keep making them!
So excited to see a new game by FM-Studio. Have been checking every so often and was more than happy when I found it. Can't wait to play. I know it won't disappoint.

I've downloaded every game in the series so far and this one was absolutely worth every penny. I had to use the hints a few times as I personally didn't always see the next required step clearly, but if anything I think that shows that the game is challenging enough without being impossible! Really really enjoyed playing and can't wait for the next one.

I had a glitch about half way through and had to start over. I really enjoyed playing this game. There are a lot of rooms in the game and a lot of puzzles. I did have to use hints and walkthroughs to figure out what to do next a few times.

Love it, the best of the forgotten hill series. There's a glitch with the saving of progress. I got through to the last part of the game and the battery died on my tablet. After recharging and opening up the app my progress had been wiped and i had to start from the beginning again. Needs looking at.
replyContent: Thank you very much for playing Forgotten Hill Disillusion! What happened to you is really strange, we will definitely look into it, thanks a lot for reporting.

content: The game is worth the price. At first, I hesitated in buying because I expected Disillusion to be on the same level as the other Forgotten Hill games and was afraid that it is overpriced. How happy I am that I am wrong! The length, the story telling, the puzzles- everything is one step above all other FH games. If you've played the FH series, this game is definitely a must-play and I would recommend it to anyone who enjoys point-and-click adventures and puzzles. To the developers, job well done!
replyContent: Thank you so much Ash, we are super happy you liked Forgotten Hill Disillusion!

content: I dont get it.I played the first chapter and then I payed to get the rest of the game, but it wont let me continue. The old lady keeps telling me to click the picture, but when i do, i just get sent straight here to play store.... how do I play the next 3 chapters?
replyContent: Hey susanna, thanks for playing! You cannot continue with the app called "The Library". You need to download and open this app that is called called "Forgotten Hill Disillusion" (the one with a red icon and 3 people). You will then have access to the full game (and there is much more than just 3 additional chapters ;) ...)

content: Absolutely wonderful! Well worth it. Great story, fun graphics, challenging puzzles, and nice and long. Best so far from this developer. Can't wait for more.
The only problem I have with Forgotten Hill is I want more games. More, more, more.

I really like these games so I paid $4.99 for this one. I haven't been playing long at all & I'm completely stuck. I've been over it & over it & I even uninstalled and started over. There are no hints in any rooms. I need a diamond to open a door with diamond, heart, club & spade. Or Mandrake to make bread. I can't do anything else. And I paid $5 for this game!
replyContent: Hello Rey, thanks for playing. Be careful to look everywhere with your camera, you will find where the diamond is! Anyway, if you got stuck there's a complete series of Walkthrough videos on our website at https://www.forgotten-hill.com/videos/f-h-disillusion/ (and also on youtube)

content: I love the Forgotten Hill games. I have played all of them on an android tablet and they are some of the best and most creative puzzle games available in Google play. DISILLUSION is really well done and the series just keeps getting better. The camera feature is an awesome addition and I highly recommend the game to those who enjoy adventure puzzles with a very macabre twist. If you enjoy games in the style of Rusty Lake, you are likely to quickly become a fan of Forgotten Hill!
Another awesome game!!! Really enjoying the challenges and graphics. Well worth the price.

Longtime fan of this franchise. Devs dramatically raised the standards of puzzles, game mechanics, lore, game length and just about everything else in Disillusion. I recommend it if you like horror themed, mostly casual, puzzle adventure games. Unfortunately, a few of the puzzles were too clever, tedious or logically obtuse for me to solve without a walkthrough. Good for players who are very perceptive and very patient. If you are not, you may enjoy their earlier games more.

I was worried about buying a game with no reviews, but I've enjoyed the other Forgotten Hill games, so I gave it a chance. I'm glad I did because this game is great! Unlike other FH games, this one is extremely long, so I think I definitely got my money's worth. Just when I thought I'd completed the game, another level opened up. The puzzles were challenging, but not so difficult that they're impossible without a walkthrough. And I didn't run into a single bug, which is pretty rare!

I love this series but the app keeps crashing, but I expected bugs as it was a recent release, I look forward to improvement! Update: I switched to low performance and it crashes less often but it still crashes occasionally during room changes
replyContent: Hi Alex, thanks for playing! Have you tried changing the quality settings? Just go in the Settings Menu by clicking the "gear" button in the main screen and change Quality from HIGH to LOW. This will make the game "lighter" but it will not change at all the game experience. Just uses lighter graphics. Let us know if it solves your issues.

content: I'd say this is the best forgotten hill game yet. I was thoroughly enjoying the game. It had me occupied for hours. Edit: thanks for the response. Everything worked out great. Amazing game! Thanks!
replyContent: Hi Talise, thanks for playing. So sorry for the glitch you encountered. We've already fixed it and pushed an update, it's should be availabe in a few hours. This will fix your situation without the need to restart. Just be sure you take version 1.1.10 or higher.

content: This game is everything I love about the series. Thought provoking puzzles making for a challenging game.
I love this series and this game proves that it just keeps getting better with each new chapter!
